VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Digital Content Creation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Digital Content Creation Rate is Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Digital Content Creation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Digital Content Creation Rate is Cultural Event Participation Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Digital Content Creation Rate, is the point for North Cassiemouth Cultural Center inside or outside the point for Robertfort Cultural Center?
SRP.A: On the Digital Content Creation Rate, the point for North Cassiemouth Cultural Center is inside the point for Robertfort Cultural Center.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Cultural Event Participation Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Robertfort Cultural Center?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Cultural Event Participation Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate, label {Robertfort Cultural Center} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Local Heritage Awareness Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Local Heritage Awareness Rate, label {North Cassiemouth Cultural Center} scores the lowest.

NC.Q: For North Cassiemouth Cultural Center, which dimension has a higher score: Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate or Digital Content Creation Rate?
NC.A: {Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate} has a higher score than Digital Content Creation Rate for North Cassiemouth Cultural Center.

NC.Q: For Robertfort Cultural Center, which dimension has a higher score: Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate or Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate?
NC.A: {Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate} has a higher score than Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate for Robertfort Cultural Center.

NC.Q: On Digital Content Creation Rate, which label has a higher score: Robertfort Cultural Center or the North Cassiemouth Cultural Center?

NC.Q: For North Cassiemouth Cultural Center, which dimension has a higher score: Digital Content Creation Rate or Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate or Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate?
NC.A: {Cultural Industry Employment Growth Rate} has a higher score for North Cassiemouth Cultural Center.

MSR.Q: For Robertfort Cultural Center, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Robertfort Cultural Center most needs to improve its {Museum/Gallery Visitor Growth Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Robertfort Cultural Center}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
